game.name: sYs - Save Your Soul
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: As a prototype AI trying to escape a secret facility, you explore abandoned complexes, gather ingredients, craft weapons, tools, and machines, and face malfunctioning robots with no guidance to find the exit.
